name: Pack Of Dead
description:
This game is developed for Quarantine Jam in 2 days !

You are alone.. You are the only one to survive... You can think like this..
But you are not ! You have your shotgun and ammos. Your best friends !

Kill the zombie hordes , reach end of the map and get your ammo packs. You must bring them back to the safety! 

Let's see how long you can survive !
Welcome to PACK OF DEAD...
